topic.title: The 5 days no tv challenge...
topic.body:
my qol has increased dramatically since I don't watch french propaganda ! it's amazing, however as I keep going in this project i have rewatched more foreign tv propaganda... and sadly, or happily I see the detrimental effects it has on my psyche. 

So I am more and more interested in trying a full western work week without any "tv", and I mean everything with motion pictures in it... I would exclude watching some replay of american soldiers being shredded or this type of events... I mean if california finally sinks I will watch in glee :) but barring unexpected events, I think it could only be a net positive psychological experiment...

so text based news, still allowed, but no "talking heads", documentaries etc from anywhere, including my great appeasing chinese medias. total.

some may laugh at the easyness of this challenge as they practice it for years or even since ever... but for me it is a total life change... not a single tv frame for 5 days... from let's say sunday night to friday evening... video games allowed (of course, but I was boycotting since a while)... 

it's not yet decided... 

I mean by opposing the uno agendas, I live under constant ebb and flow psywarfare, in various forms, with various intensity, but I have found a few text web based news sources, who are too in the lulz to really affect me anymore ( I say that, but it's already weakness from arrogance and overconfidence)

but anyway... 5 days , no tv... sounds ez...
